attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is unfair and a ridiculous taboo for society to uphold.

I have seen shirtless men with larger cup-sizes than me walking around unabashedly, and thus women should be allowed the privilege of this freedom too. 

Although Britain has a reputation for its unfortunate weather we get swelteringly hot in the summer and are confined to clothes even then.

Men's torsos are not censored and women's shouldn't be either. Naked is natural. Natural is naked.
